body:
@traceypowers would it have been easier to understand if the array slide had been more similar to the slice slide? Perhaps instead of:

```
var a [2]string
a[0] = "Hello"
a[1] = "World"
```

The array could be declared like so:

```
a := [2]string{"Hello", "World"}
```

This would make it symmetrical with the declaration of the slice in the next slide:

```
s := []int{2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13}
```

This doesn't cover the subtleties of arrays vs. slices, but the tour isn't really the place for subtleties, I think.
